title: When i change internet i get bug Splats when i try to load onto the rift
body: This is really really odd, i have been playing league since season 1 and have never had problems installing or playing the game until now. When i play at home i dont have any issues connecting to games or playing but if i go to a friends house and try to load onto rift to start a game, it crashes and i get a bug splat (everytime) no matter what account im on. Ive disabled all firewalls, repaired client, and updated drives but no matter what, i cannot get into any type of game (normal, bot, custom). Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: When you play at your friend's house, are you using the same exact computer and display or are you using a different display when you play there? We've seen some crashes like this happen if there's a difference in the Display Resolution between two different displays being played on. If this is the case, we should be able to resolve this fairly easily.
